news_header: Liam Payne, a former member of One Direction, tragically died at 31 after falling from a hotel balcony in Buenos Aires.
news_text: Liam Payne, known for being part of the boy band One Direction, died at the age of 31 after falling from the third floor of a hotel in Buenos Aires, Argentina. The incident occurred on Wednesday, following a police report about an 'aggressive man' possibly under the influence of drugs or alcohol. Upon arrival, authorities found Payne had just fallen and suffered severe injuries that he could not recover from. He had previously spoken about his struggles with alcoholism and was reportedly in Buenos Aires to visit his ex-girlfriend, Niall Horan. One Direction, formed in 2010, became one of the most successful boy bands, selling around 70 million records before disbanding in 2015. Following the news of his death, fans gathered at the hotel to pay tribute, lighting candles and singing One Direction songs.
